response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and achieve remarkable results. This exceptional piece is not just an item; it's an investment in growth and success. Considering its unparalleled features and benefits, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. I am confident that this offer will provide you with substantial value and return on your investment. Let's discuss how we can make this opportunity work for both of us.", "product_price": 1200000}
